description:
codereview: undo last night's rollback

Update version check from 1.4 to 1.9.  Suggest 2.0.

messages.text:
$ hg p*** failed to import extension codereview from
/Users/rsc/g/go/lib/codereview/codereview.py:

The code review extension requires Mercurial 1.9 or newer.You are
using Mercurial 1.8.
To install a new Mercurial, use
	sudo easy_install mercurial==2.0
or visit http://mercurial.selenic.com/downloads/.

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com (cc: golang-dev@googlegroups.com),

Please take another look.
LGTM on the assumption that this is the same code as before except for versioning as discussed

Sorry, gmail ate the newlines in my message.
The actual output looks like:

$ hg p
*** failed to import extension codereview from
/Users/rsc/g/go/lib/codereview/codereview.py:
The code review extension requires Mercurial 1.9 or newer.
You are using Mercurial 1.8.

To install a new Mercurial, use

	sudo easy_install mercurial==2.0

or visit http://mercurial.selenic.com/downloads/.

subject: code review 5413046: codereview: undo last night's rollback
